name: God Hunter (Oath of the Undying)
description:
Made in just about 2 weeks for the PGM Game Jam 2020 (I started in Feb 2021.)

After her child was taken as sacrifice to the high God Balor, warrior Medb goes on a brutal rampage for revenge...  Control Medb in taking down the many Gods who stand in her way before Balor and vengeance.

GodHunter is a MetroidVania with difficult yet fair bosses.

This is a prototype/Proof of Concept and missing much, not all skills are available in the demo, no cutscenes or story sections have been added as I'd like to focus on mechanical feedback.  Its been a tough 2 weeks so likely riddled with bugs/glitches.
